animeDescription: Official music video for the song Change our Mirai! by the fictional band Irodorimidori spawned from Sega's Chunithm rhythm arcade game. It is the 1st song in the Irodorimidori franchise.(Source: AniDB)
animeRelated: ['Sequel: Brilliant Better', 'Alternative version: Change Our Mirai!: Our 7 Lights']
